entries.create_err_profane_name: The chat channel name you specified is not appropriate. The chat channel will not be created.
entries.create_err_profane_title: The chat channel title you specified is not appropriate. The chat channel will not be created.
entries.help_who_icons: These columns represent icons regarding the status of a user in the chat channel. For example, in the moderator column, if a particular user is the moderator, an icon would appear.
entries.help_who_table: In this box,  the information regarding the channel's users are displayed.
entries.help_who_info: In this box, the information regarding a channel is displayed.
entries.help_create_check_moderated: Checking this box only allows you, and those you select, to talk in the chat channel.
entries.help_create_check_private: Check this box if you wish your channel to be private, preventing others from wandering in and only allowing those you invite to join your channel.
entries.help_create_room_title: This is the title of your chatroom. It could be a welcoming message or a topic that you and your friends discuss.
entries.help_create_room_name: This is the name of the chatroom you have created.
entries.help_create_path: This is the path in which your chatroom has been made.
entries.help_who_ban_unban: This button removes a problematic user from a channel, preventing him to return until the creator of the channel unbans him.
entries.help_who_invite_uninvite: This button allows the creator of the channel to invite/uninvite other users.
entries.help_who_kick: This button removes a problematic user from your chatroom.
entries.help_browser_buttonwho: Click this button to view details about the people in the selected room.
entries.help_browser_tree: This shows all currently available chat channels.
entries.help_browser_joinleave: Click these buttons to join or leave a chat channel.
entries.help_browser_info: Information about the selected chat channel is displayed here.
entries.help_browser_createdelete: Click these buttons to create or delete a chat channel that you own.
entries.help_browser_buttonrefresh: Click this button to refresh the channel list.
entries.join_fail_banned_prose: You cannot join %TU because you have been banned.
entries.unban_fail_room_not_exist_prose: Unban %TT from %TU failed: Room Does Not Exist.
entries.unban_fail_avatar_not_found_prose: Unban %TT from %TU failed: Avatar Not Found.
entries.ban_fail_room_not_exist_prose: Ban %TT from %TU failed: Room does not exist.
entries.ban_fail_avatar_not_found_prose: Ban %TT from %TU failed: Avatar not found.
entries.invited_prose: %TT has invited you to join the [%TO] chatroom.
entries.mod_remove_fail_not_moderator_prose: Failed to deop %TT in %TU: You are not a moderator.
entries.mod_remove_fail_room_not_moderated_prose: Failed to deop %TT in %TU: room not moderated.
entries.mod_remove_fail_room_not_exist_prose: Failed to deop %TT in %TU: room does not exist.
entries.mod_remove_fail_avatar_not_found_prose: Failed to deop %TT in %TU: avatar not found.
entries.mod_add_fail_not_moderator_prose: Failed to op %TT in %TU: You are not a moderator.
entries.mod_add_fail_room_not_moderated_prose: Failed to op %TT in %TU: room not moderated.
entries.mod_add_fail_room_not_exist_prose: Failed to op %TT in %TU: room does not exist.
entries.mod_add_fail_avatar_not_found_prose: Failed to op %TT in %TU: avatar not found.
entries.uninvite_fail_avatar_not_invited_prose: Failed to uninvite %TT from %TU:that avatar is not currently invited.
entries.uninvite_fail_not_moderator_prose: Failed to uninvite %TT from %TU: you are not a moderator.
entries.uninvite_fail_room_not_private_prose: Failed to uninvite %TT from %TU: room is not private.
entries.uninvite_fail_room_not_exist_prose: Failed to uninvite %TT from %TU: room does not exist.
entries.uninvite_fail_avatar_not_found_prose: Failed to uninvite %TT from %TU: avatar not found.
entries.invite_fail_not_moderator_prose: Failed to invite %TT to %TU: you are not a moderator.
entries.invite_fail_room_not_private_prose: Failed to invite %TT to %TU: room is not private.
entries.invite_fail_room_not_exist_prose: Failed to invite %TT to %TU: room does not exist.
entries.invite_fail_avatar_not_found_prose: Failed to invite %TT to %TU: avatar not found.
entries.err_parser_no_room_specified: You must specify a chatroom for this command.
entries.create_err_no_name: You must specify a name for your chatroom.
entries.create_err_no_title: You must specify a title for your chatroom.
entries.create_err_invalid_name:
The chatroom name is invalid.
Chatroom names may only contain letters and numbers. Spaces and punctuation are not allowed.
entries.send_err_not_a_moderator_prose: Your message to %TU was not sent because you are not a moderator.
entries.send_err_insufficient_privs_prose: Your message to %TU was not sent because it was too long.
entries.send_err_unknown_prose: Your message to %TU was not sent.
entries.destroy_fail_prose: You don't have permission to delete '%TU.'
entries.not_a_room: The specified chatroom path does not support the requested operation.
entries.join_fail_unknown_prose: Chatroom '%TU' join failed for an unknown reason.
entries.join_fail_invalid_room_id_prose: You cannot join chatroom '%TU' because the room UID was invalid.
entries.join_fail_not_invited_prose: You cannot join '%TU' because you are not invited to the room.
entries.create_create_fail_unknown_prose: Channel '%TU' creation failed for an unknown reason.
entries.create_create_fail_invalid_name_prose: Cannot create the channel named '%TU' because the name is invalid.
entries.create_create_fail_already_exists_prose: There is already a channel named '%TU.' Try creating the channel again with a different name.
entries.err_entered_room_not_found: You are not a member of any such room.
entries.self_moderator_removed: Your moderator status has been revoked.
entries.self_moderator_added: You have been granted moderator status.
entries.send_err_not_a_member: You must join this channel before you can send messages to it.
entries.send_err_no_message: You cannot send a blank message to a channel!
entries.ops_header: These are the people who have moderator status in this channel:
entries.other_moderator_removed_prose: Moderator status has been revoked from %TU.
entries.other_moderator_added_prose: Moderator status has been granted to %TU.
entries.info_members: The following people are currently on this channel:
entries.err_not_found: That channel does not exist on the server.
